import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Upload Document"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/documents"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Upload a document to the user's Workspace.
The document can be saved to:
- The Workspace's shared document list, optionally inside a folder
- A specific Space's shared document list, optionally inside a folder
- The user's Personal document list


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["method","document_name","location","document_data"],"properties":{"method":{"type":"string","description":"Creation method. Must be `file-upload`.","enum":["file-upload"]},"document_name":{"type":"string","minLength":1,"maxLength":255,"description":"Human-friendly title of the document (1–255 characters)."},"location":{"type":"object","required":["type"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","description":"Location type. One of: personal, space, workspace","enum":["personal","space","workspace"]},"space_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of a specific Space in the Workspace. Required if type = space"},"folder_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of a specific folder within the chosen location."}},"title":"DocumentLocation"},"document_data":{"type":"object","description":"Method-specific payload. Schema depends on the method chosen.","properties":{"file":{"type":"string","format":"binary","description":"Upload binary file (PDF). Required if file_url not provided"},"file_url":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"HTTPS URL to download the source file. Required if file not provided"}},"title":"DocumentData"}},"title":"DocumentCreateRequest"},"example":{"method":"file-upload","document_name":"Patient Form","location":{"type":"workspace","folder_id":"123456"},"document_data":{"file_url":"https://files.luminpdf.com/download/nda-acmecorp-abc123.pdf"}}},"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["method","document_name","location","document_data"],"properties":{"method":{"type":"string","description":"Creation method. Must be `file-upload`.","enum":["file-upload"]},"document_name":{"type":"string","minLength":1,"maxLength":255,"description":"Human-friendly title of the document (1–255 characters)."},"location":{"type":"object","required":["type"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","description":"Location type. One of: personal, space, workspace","enum":["personal","space","workspace"]},"space_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of a specific Space in the Workspace. Required if type = space"},"folder_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of a specific folder within the chosen location."}},"title":"DocumentLocation"},"document_data":{"type":"object","description":"Method-specific payload. Schema depends on the method chosen.","properties":{"file":{"type":"string","format":"binary","description":"Upload binary file (PDF). Required if file_url not provided"},"file_url":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"HTTPS URL to download the source file. Required if file not provided"}},"title":"DocumentData"}},"title":"DocumentCreateRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
